TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WinHttpHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: 基于 Windows 的 WinHTTP 接口处理消息。

span.span: Handles messages based on the WinHTTP interface of Windows.

summary.span: 此类专用于在服务器环境中使用。

span.span: This class is intended for use in server environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler> is similar to other existing classes such as <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler>. 提供实例下的处理程序 ，用于将 HTTP 请求发送到服务器并接收服务器响应。 provides a handler underneath an instance and is used to send HTTP requests out to a server and receive server responses. 设计为主要用于服务器环境中，ASP.NET Core 和与 HTTP 服务器通信的其他 .NET 应用程序。 is designed to be used primarily in server environments by ASP.NET Core and other .NET applications that communicate with HTTP servers. 还向开发人员提供比类更精细地控制应用程序的 HTTP 通信的开发人员 。 also provides developers with more granular control over the application's HTTP communication than the class. 这允许开发人员实现更高级的 HTTP 方案或修改系统默认值 (例如，代理设置、超时和服务器 SSL 证书验证) 。This allows developers to implement more advanced HTTP scenarios or modify system defaults (for example, proxy settings, timeouts, and server SSL certificate validation). 不打算替换为 。 is not intended to be a replacement for . 相反，它是针对不充分的方案提供的更高级版本 。Instead, it's a more advanced version that's provided for scenarios where is insufficient. 在 Windows 的 WinHTTP 接口上实现为精简包装，并且仅在 Windows 系统上受支持。 is implemented as a thin wrapper on the WinHTTP interface of Windows and is only supported on Windows systems. 当使用多个处理程序的链时， 应在链的底部。When using a chain of multiple handlers, should be at the bottom of the chain. 还可将此类作为 NuGet 包安装，以便在桌面应用中使用。This class is also available for use in Desktop apps by installing it as a NuGet package. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [系统 WinHttpHandler NuGet 包](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler/)。For more information, see [System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler/). 从 .NET 5.0 开始， 将不再作为 .net 运行时的一部分包含在 *System.Net.Http.dll* 程序集内。Starting in .NET 5.0, is no longer included in the *System.Net.Http.dll* assembly as part of the .NET runtime. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WinHttpHandler 从 .net 运行时中删除](/dotnet/core/compatibility/3.1-5.0#winhttphandler-removed-from-net-runtime)。For more information, see [WinHttpHandler removed from .NET runtime](/dotnet/core/compatibility/3.1-5.0#winhttphandler-removed-from-net-runtime).

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序用于自动解压缩 HTTP 内容响应的解压缩方法类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of decompression method used by the handler for automatic decompression of the HTTP content response.

Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `GZip | Deflate`。The default value for this property is `GZip | Deflate`.

member this.AutomaticRedirection : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否应跟随 HTTP 重定向响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow HTTP redirection responses.

Docs.value: <see langword="true" /> to follow HTTP redirection responses; otherwise, <see langword="false" />. 默认值为 。The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，将自动遵循服务器中的所有 HTTP 重定向响应，除非它们从 HTTPS 终结点重定向到 HTTP 终结点。When this property is set to `true`, all HTTP redirect responses from the server will be followed automatically except if they are redirecting from an HTTPS endpoint to an HTTP endpoint.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to check the revocation list of certificates during SSL certificate validation.

Docs.value: <see langword="true" /> to check the revocation list of certificates during SSL certificate validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />. 默认值为 。The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default value for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy CookieUsePolicy { System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy get(); void set(System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy value); };
member this.CookieUsePolicy : System.Net.Http.CookieUsePolicy with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应如何管理和使用 cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how cookies should be managed and used.

summary.span: 开发者可以选择忽略 cookie、允许处理程序自动管理 cookie 或使用 对象手动处理 cookie。

span.span: Developers can choose to ignore cookies, allow the handler to automatically manage them or manually handle them using a object.

Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default for this property is . If this value is set to <xref:System.Net.Http.CookieUsePolicy.UseSpecifiedCookieContainer?displayProperty=nameWithType>, then a container object must be initialized and assigned to the <xref:System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.CookieContainer%2A> property. 否则，当尝试发送请求时，将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception will be thrown when trying to send a request.

summary.span: 获取或设置允许的最大 HTTP 重定向数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of allowed HTTP redirects.

Docs.value: The maximum number of allowed HTTP redirects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为50。The default value for this property is 50. 仅当设置为时，此值才适用 `true` 。This value only applies if is set to `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置可从响应中排出的最大数据量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

Docs.value: The maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxResponseHeadersLength { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxResponseHeadersLength : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器响应中标头部分的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

Docs.value: The maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通过发送具有无限标头数据量的响应，来防止未经授权的服务器尝试停止客户端。This property protects the client from an unauthorized server attempting to stall the client by sending a response with an infinite amount of header data. 此属性的默认值为65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

Docs.value: A writable dictionary of custom properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证服务器证书的回调方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a callback method to validate the server certificate.

summary.span: 此回叫是 SSL 握手的一部分。

span.span: This callback is part of the SSL handshake.

Docs.value: The callback should return <see langword="true" /> if the server certificate is considered valid and the request should be sent. 否则，返回 。Otherwise, return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `null`。The default value is `null`. 如果此属性为 `null` ，则使用标准的知名证书颁发机构验证服务器证书。If this property is `null`, the server certificate is validated using standard well-known certificate authorities.

Docs.value: The collection of TLS/SSL protocols supported by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 `SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12`。The default value is `SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12`.

summary.span: 获取或设置代理设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the proxy setting.

summary.span: 此属性可设置为禁用代理、使用自定义代理或在计算机上使用 WinHTTP 或 WinInet 的代理设置。

span.span: This property can be set to disable the proxy, use a custom proxy, or use the proxy settings of WinHTTP or WinInet on the machine.

Docs.value: To be added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value of this property is the WinHTTP stack proxy settings.
